attributes.action: To FULLY support a state funeral SPECIFICALLY for Baroness Thatcher.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mrs Thatcher did more than any other PM to end the destructive, union led chaos which forced the UK to its knees.  Lady Thatcher must be properly and specially honoured when she finally passes away.  God bless her.

rejection.details: There are several petition in existence already: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/yesstatefuneral/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
